file.name: pockets.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
paths:
    /pockets/:
        x-hidden: true
        get:
            summary: Get a list of pockets.
            tags:
                - Pockets
            parameters:
                - description: "The expand."
                  in: query
                  name: expand
                  schema:
                      type: string
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/fullPocketSchema"
                                type: array
                    description: Success
        post:
            responses:
                "201":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/fullPocketSchema"
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Pockets
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/PocketPost"
                required: true
            summary: Add a pocket.
    "/pockets/{id}/edit":
        x-hidden: true
        get:
            summary: Get a pocket for editing.
            tags:
                - Pockets
            parameters:
                - description: Pocket ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                - description: The expand.
                  in: query
                  name: expand
                  schema:
                      type: string
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                properties:
                                    pocketID:
                                        description: The pocket ID
                                        type: integer
                                    widgetID:
                                        description: The widget type.
                                        type: string
                                    name:
                                        description: The name of the pocket
                                        type: string
                                    page:
                                        description: Which page to display the Pocket on.
                                        type: string
                                    body:
                                        description: The body of the pocket.
                                        type: string
                                    format:
                                        enum:
                                            - raw
                                            - widget
                                        type: string
                                    repeatType:
                                        enum:
                                            - once
                                            - after
                                            - before
                                            - every
                                            - index
                                        type: string
                                        description: Pocket repeat type.
                                    repeatIndexes:
                                        description: Repeat indexes
                                        type: integer
                                    mobileType:
                                        enum:
                                            - only
                                            - never
                                            - default
                                        type: string
                                        description: Whether or not pocket is active on mobile.
                                    sort:
                                        description: Pocket sort order.
                                        type: integer
                                        default: 0
                                    isEmbeddable:
                                        description: Pocket can be embedded.
                                        type: boolean
                                        default: false
                                    location:
                                        description: Location of the pocket on the page.
                                        type: string
                                    isAd:
                                        description: If the pocket is an ad.
                                        type: boolean
                                        default: false
                                    enabled:
                                        description: Pocket enabled/disabled.
                                        type: boolean
                                        default: false
                                    categoryID:
                                        description: Pocket active in this category.
                                        type: integer
                                    includeChildCategories:
                                        description: Incldue category child categories.
                                        type: integer
                                    roleIDs:
                                        description: RoleIDs that the pocket will apply to.
                                        type: array
                                        items:
                                            type: integer
                                required:
                                    - pocketID
                                    - name
                                    - repeatType
                                    - body
                                    - format
                                type: object
                    description: Success
    "/pockets/{id}":
        x-hidden: true
        get:
            summary: Get a pocket by id.
            tags:
                - Pockets
            parameters:
                - description: Pocket ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                - description: "The expand."
                  in: query
                  name: expand
                  schema:
                      type: string
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/fullPocketSchema"
                    description: Success
        patch:
            parameters:
                - description: The pocket ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/PocketPatch"
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Pockets
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/PocketPatch"
                required: true
            summary: Update a pocket.
        delete:
            parameters:
                - description: The pocket ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "204":
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Pockets
            summary: Delete a Pocket.
components:
    schemas:
        fullPocketSchema:
            properties:
                pocketID:
                    type: integer
                widgetID:
                    type: string
                    description: The widget type.
                name:
                    description: The name of the pocket
                    type: string
                page:
                    description: Which page to display the Pocket on.
                    type: string
                body:
                    description: The body of the pocket.
                    type: string
                enabled:
                    type: integer
                    description: Pocket enabled/disabled.
                sort:
                    type: integer
                    description: The pocket sort order.
                repeatType:
                    enum:
                        - once
                        - after
                        - before
                        - every
                        - index
                    type: string
                    description: Pocket repeat type.
                mobileType:
                    enum:
                        - only
                        - never
                        - default
                    type: string
                    description: Whether or not pocket is active on mobile.
                isEmbeddable:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether or not pocket is embeddable.
                isDashboard:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether or not pocket is active in dashboard.
                testMode:
                    type: integer
                    description: If the pocket is in test mode.
                format:
                    enum:
                        - raw
                        - widget
                    type: string
                location:
                    type: string
                    description: Location of the pocket on the page.
                isAd:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Whether or not pocket is of type ad.
            required:
                - pocketID
                - widgetID
                - name
                - repeatType
        PocketPost:
            type: object
            properties:
                name:
                    type: string
                    description: The name of the pocket
                body:
                    type: string
                    description: The body of the pocket.
                repeatType:
                    enum:
                        - once
                        - after
                        - before
                        - every
                        - index
                widgetID:
                    type: string
                    description: The widget type.
                page:
                    description: Which page to display the Pocket on.
                    type: string
                repeatEvery:
                    description: Repeat frequency.
                    type: integer
                repeatIndexes:
                    description: Repeat indexes
                    type: integer
                mobileType:
                    enum:
                        - only
                        - never
                        - default
                isDashboard:
                    description: Pocket active in the dasboard.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                sort:
                    description: Pocket sort order.
                    type: integer
                    default: 0
                isEmbeddable:
                    description: Pocket can be embedded.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                location:
                    description: Location of the pocket on the page.
                    type: string
                isAd:
                    description: If the pocket is an ad.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                enabled:
                    description: Pocket enabled/disabled.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                categoryID:
                    description: Pocket active in this category.
                    type: integer
                includeChildCategories:
                    description: Incldue category child categories.
                    type: integer
                format:
                    description: Format of the pocket
                    enum:
                        - raw
                        - widget
                    type: string
                roleIDs:
                    description: RoleIDs that the pocket will apply to.
                    type: array
                    items:
                        type: integer
            required:
                - pocketID
                - widgetID
                - name
                - repeatType
        PocketPatch:
            type: object
            properties:
                name:
                    description: The name of the pocket
                    type: string
                body:
                    type: string
                    description: The body of the pocket.
                repeatType:
                    enum:
                        - once
                        - after
                        - before
                        - every
                        - index
                widgetID:
                    type: string
                    description: The widget type.
                page:
                    description: Which page to display the Pocket on.
                    type: string
                repeatEvery:
                    description: Repeat frequency.
                    type: integer
                repeatIndexes:
                    description: Repeat indexes
                    type: integer
                mobileType:
                    enum:
                        - only
                        - never
                        - default
                    type: string
                isDashboard:
                    description: Pocket active in the dasboard.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                sort:
                    description: Pocket sort order.
                    type: integer
                    default: 0
                isEmbeddable:
                    description: Pocket can be embedded.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                location:
                    description: Location of the pocket on the page.
                    type: string
                isAd:
                    description: If the pocket is an ad.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                enabled:
                    description: Pocket enabled/disabled.
                    type: boolean
                    default: false
                categoryID:
                    description: Pocket active in this category.
                    type: integer
                includeChildCategories:
                    description: Incldue category child categories.
                    type: integer
                format:
                    description: Format of the pocket
                    enum:
                        - raw
                        - widget
                    type: string
                roleIDs:
                    description: RoleIDs that the pocket will apply to.
                    type: array
                    items:
                        type: integer
